articles.description: Ruud van Nistelrooy is set to be appointed as Leicester City's new boss, replacing Steve Cooper, who was sacked earlier this week.
articles.title: Ruud van Nistelrooy: Leicester set to appoint Dutchman as head coach to replace Steve Cooper

articles.description: England equal their third-highest score in women's T20 internationals to cruise to victory against South Africa and seal the three-match series with a game to spare.
articles.title: South Africa vs England: Danni Wyatt-Hodge stars as tourists win to seal series

articles.description: Human rights group Amnesty criticises a new 2022 Qatar World Cup legacy fund it says does not include compensation for migrant workers harmed during preparations for the tournament.
articles.title: Fifa legacy fund after Qatar World Cup 'shameful' for lack of migrant worker aid, says Amnesty

articles.description: Former England and Harlequins prop Joe Marler announces his retirement from professional rugby aged 34.
articles.title: Joe Marler: Ex-England prop announces retirement from rugby

articles.description: The Italian Grand Prix at Monza will remain on the Formula 1 schedule until at least 2031.
articles.title: Italian Grand Prix: New deal sees race continue on F1 calendar at Monza until 2031
